column4: in general, is there any real advantage to using the i686 kernel?
if you have a PII or ++
I have a laptop with a Celeron M Processor
in Synaptic, what do I need to select to install the 686 kernel?
I don't use Synapitc, but you want to install the kernel-image-`uname -r`-686 package (or something close to that)
